author: BrickPiet44
title: Standard cars, no novelty, OK for addition to a collection
review:
This set contains basically no new features.
A tow truck had been on sale as a single set (the red one) and the same red tow truck was included in the 347 fire station.
The only new thing are the colours, yellow and blue. The blue tow is, admitted, new for the colour.
The car is a standard car from those days, this time in red with a black roof top. 
So why this set?
It ads to your Legoland collection two cars. But that's it.
So 3 out of 5.
